channel.title: Grownups Read Things They Wrote as Kids
channel.description: Remembering the good, the bad, and the awkward parts of growing up. Since 2007.

item.title: 305: "At least I know I'm fertile" (Halifax)
item.description: Erin laments being a late bloomer, Jenna reads her last will and testament, Michelle takes an east-coast-themed acid trip, and much more. Recorded live at The Company House in Halifax, NS.
item.itunes:summary:
